 /**
176
 * loadWithConfig
177
 * Uses the select V2 system to load data
178
 * its magic!
179
 * see the v2 readme
180
 * @return mixed[] [status => bool, count => integer, message => string]
181
 */
182
 public function loadWithConfig(
183
 ?array $where_config = null,
184
 ?array $order_config = null,
185
 ?array $options_config = null,
186
 ?array $join_tables = null
187
 ): array {
188
 $this->makeWorker();
189
190
 // Cache support
191

192
 $hashme = "";
193
 if ($this->cache != null) {
194
 $bit1 = sha1("bit1" . implode("|", $this->giveArrayOnNull($where_config)));
195
 $bit2 = sha1("bit2" . implode("|", $this->giveArrayOnNull($order_config)));
196
 $bit3 = sha1("bit3" . implode("|", $this->giveArrayOnNull($options_config)));
197
 $bit4 = sha1("bit4" . implode("|", $this->giveArrayOnNull($join_tables)));
198
 $shaHash = sha1(
199
 $bit1 .
200
 $bit2 .
201
 $bit3 .
202
 $bit4 .
203
 $this->worker->getTable() .
204
 count($this->worker->getFields())
205
 );
206
 $hashme = substr($shaHash, 0, 7);
207
 $hitCache = $this->cache->cacheVaild($this->worker->getTable(), $hashme);
208
 }
209
 if ($hitCache == true) {
210
 // wooo vaild data from cache!
211
 return $this->processLoad($this->cache->readHash($this->worker->getTable(), $hashme));
212
 }
213
 // Cache missed, read from the DB
214
 $load_data = $this->sql->selectV2(
215
 ["table" => $this->worker->getTable()],
216
 $order_config,
217
 $where_config,
218
 $options_config,
219
 $join_tables
220
 );
221
 if ($load_data["status"] == false) {
222
 $error_msg = get_class($this) . " Unable to load data: " . $load_data["message"];
223
 return $this->addError(__FILE__, __FUNCTION__, $error_msg, ["count" => 0]);
224
 }
225
 if ($this->cache != null) {
226
 // push data to cache so we can avoid reading from DB as much
227
 $this->cache->writeHash($this->worker->getTable(), $hashme, $load_data, $this->cacheAllowChanged);
228
 }
229
 return $this->processLoad($load_data);
230
 }
231
 /**
232
 * loadDataFromList
233
 * using the magic of IN we load all objects
234
 * with the selected field that their value matchs
235
 * anything in the $values array
236
 * @return mixed[] [status => bool, count => integer, message => string]
237
 */
238
 protected function loadDataFromList(string $fieldname = "id", array $values = []): array
239
 {
240
 $this->makeWorker();
241
 $uids = [];
242
 foreach ($values as $id) {
243
 if (in_array($id, $uids) == false) {
244
 $uids[] = $id;
245
 }
246
 }
247
 if (count($uids) == 0) {
248
 return $this->addError(__FILE__, __FUNCTION__, "No ids sent!", ["count" => 0]);
249
 }
250
 $typecheck = $this->worker->getFieldType($fieldname, true);
251
 if ($typecheck == null) {
252
 return [
253
 "status" => false,
254
 "count" => 0,
255
 "message" => "Invaild field",
256
 ];
257
 }
258
 return $this->loadWithConfig([
259
 "fields" => [$fieldname],
260
 "matches" => ["IN"],
261
 "values" => [$uids],
262
 "types" => [$typecheck],
263
 ]);
264
 }

 /**
266
 * processLoad
267
 * takes the reply from mysqli and fills out objects and builds the collection
268
 * @return mixed[] [status => bool, count => integer, message => string]
269
 */
270
 protected function processLoad($load_data = []): array
271
 {
272
 $this->makeWorker();
273
 $use_field = $this->worker->use_id_field;
274
 if ($this->worker->bad_id == false) {
275
 $use_field = "id";
276
 }
277
 foreach ($load_data["dataset"] as $entry) {
278
 $new_object = new $this->worker_class($entry);
279
 if ($new_object->isLoaded() == true) {
280
 $this->collected[$entry[$use_field]] = $new_object;
281
 }
282
 }
283
 return ["status" => true, "count" => count($this->collected), "message" => "ok"];
284
 }
